html:
Allarity Therapeutics A/S, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company developing novel oncology therapeutics, has completed the USD20 million in PIPE investment, in which the company issued 20,000 shares of preferred stock (Preferred Stock) at USD1,000 per share and a common stock purchase warrant (the Warrant) to purchase 2,018,958 shares of common stock to 3i LP (3i Group Plc), a Delaware limited partnership

LifeSci Capital acted as placement agent for the PIPE Investment.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)20
Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryDIRECT INVESTMENT
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-12-21

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Medical Prognosis Institute A/S
Acquirer (Company)3i Group plc

Deal Rationale

No. Shares Issued20000
